function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Congestion in public transport during rush hours","Impact":"Negative effects on customer experience and health of passengers","Mitigation":"Implement flexible integration of public transport services and on-demand/sharing services, accompanied by serious sanitising measures","Technologies":"Data sharing, interoperability","People":"Passengers, city inhabitants","Owner":"City authorities"},{"Description":"Unpredictable factors disrupting sustainable mobility culture","Impact":"Disruption of the process of shaping sustainable mobility culture","Mitigation":"Provide favourable conditions to reshape mobility behaviors and mindset, integrate new and traditional mobility services within local transport policies","Technologies":"Data sharing, interoperability","People":"City inhabitants, policymakers","Owner":"City authorities"}]}
